resume_data: IT Network Security Systems Engineer span lITspan Network span lSecurityspan Systems Engineer IT Network Security Systems Engineer GigaNetworks Inc Miami FL A driven IT Network Security Engineer with 3 years of experience in planning architecting implementing and administering various cyber security solutions Highly motivated to learn and eager to continue developing as an IT professional Extremely personable with clear ability to communicate with C level executives and nontechnical personnel Possesses the ability to adapt to changing circumstances Applies highlevel problemsolving skills in all roles to overcome problems and obstacles Successful working independently and thrives when working as part of a team to effectively achieve common goals Work Experience IT Network Security Systems Engineer GigaNetworks Inc Miami FL May 2017 to Present Role o Evaluate the security posture of enterprise clients and recommend ITnetwork security solutions to mitigate risk o Plan architect implement and support complex ITnetwork security solutions in enterprise environments o Perform proofofconcepts to assist in closing sales opportunities o Develop and execute statementofworks for professional services engagements o Provide information to clients on ITnetwork security solutions to assist them in making informed decisions o Support the account executives in client engagements to discover opportunities and define technical requirements o Facilitate smooth clientvendor communication to help clients choose the right solution to meet their requirements Project Lead Engineer o Palo Alto Networks Palo Alto Firewall general administration Deploy Palo Alto VM Firewall in Microsoft Azure to be used as a Disaster Recovery site for users to continue accessing the internet securely Create sitetosite VPNs to cloud proxy service o Symantec Deploy Integrate and Configure the following Symantec solutions Proxies Reporter Management Center CAS WSS CloudSOC and SSLV Administer troubleshoot and perform Health Checks on Symantec Products o Active Directory Certificate Services Deploy multiple three tier Microsoft Certificate Authority Chains within a large enterprise environment Configure custom certificate templates and permissions Work with Active Directory to Enable Certificate Auto Enrollment and deploy User and Machine certificates via Group Policy Deploy and Configure Network Device Enrollment Services NDES o VMware Deploy and Administer ESXi and VCenter Servers Network Security Administrator Miami Dade County IT Department Miami FL August 2016 to May 2017 Network Security Administrator responsible for the proxy infrastructure and backup to the antivirus infrastructure Blue Coat Proxy o Plan architect and implement new Blue Coat proxy infrastructure to support over 28 departments and over 30000 employees o Implement new proxy features such as SSL Inspection antivirus scanning at the gateway and geolocationthreat risk based policies o Coordinate testing and notifications across all departments o Implement Management Center for unified proxy management and Proxy Reporter appliance o Proxy infrastructure support Createmodify rules and exceptions Troubleshoot and manage internet access Maintain monthly log backups and create reports of internet usage Trend Micro Office Scan o Installconfigure of new Office Scan Console servers to support infrastructure expansion o Manage Office Scan Firewall Plugin agent used to meet PCI compliancy requirements Added firewall rules and applied policies to agents to propagate new firewall rules o Troubleshoot and create policy Deep Security o Migrate Windows 2003 legacy systems from Office Scan to Deep Security to implement virtual patching Security Analyst Miami Dade County IT Department Miami FL February 2016 to August 2016 Blue Coat Proxy Gateway Appliance o Responsibilities Maintain the Deny Always list which blocks malicious sites Create policy backups in case of failure Create log reports based on user requests Add rules policy through the graphical interface Troubleshoot and resolve user access issues Trend Micro Endpoint Security o InstallUninstall the Office Scan agent and create packages o Create groups to apply exclusions policies functions and scheduling of multiple machines though inheritance Update Proxy and Trend Micro antivirus documentation and network diagrams Data Analyst Internship Miami Dade County State Attorneys Office Miami FL June 2015 to August 2015 Data Analyst using schemas and SQL Server Reporting Services SSRS for inhouse reporting Education Bachelors in Computer Science Florida International University Miami FL August 2013 to August 2016 Skills Proxy 2 years Antivirus 1 year Microsoft Windows Certificate
